front.title: Laser Cannon Battery
front.gametext: Deploy on your capital starship. May deploy as a 'react'. May target a starship using X Force, where X = 0 to 3. Draw destiny. Subtract 2 if targeting a starship with maneuver. If destiny +X > defense value, target hit and opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Trade Federation battleships use concealed quad laser emplacements. Though their coverage is limited, the surprise factor and ferocious firing rate is often overwhelming.
